verses.roman:
yāhā va-i guru vastu nāhi suniścita
tathāpi gurura dharma gaurava-varjita

synonyms: yāhā—which; va-i—besides; guru—great; vastu—thing; nāhi—there is not; suniścita—quite certainly; tathāpi—still; gurura—of greatness; dharma—characteristics; gaurava-varjita—devoid of pride.
translation: "There is certainly nothing greater than Her love. But Her love is devoid of pride. That is the sign of its greatness.
